member.name: T:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.GraphicsTransformationQuality
member.summary: Defines smoothing quality for text and vector graphics; interpolation quality for raster images.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.GraphicsTransformationQuality.HighQuality
member.summary: High quality conversion of graphics, lower speed

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.GraphicsTransformationQuality.HighSpeed
member.summary: High speed conversion of graphics, median quality

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor
member.summary: Defines a base class for PDF extractors.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the extractor class.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the instance and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.Reset
member.summary: Resets the instance, disposes internal resources and releases the file. Use this method before loading another PDF file.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.LoadDocumentFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Loads document from file. Supported formats: PDF, PNG, JPEG, BMP and TIFF (single-page). Call .Reset() method before loading another file into the same instance so it will release the lock for the file.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.LoadDocumentFromStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads document from stream. Supported formats: PDF, PNG, JPEG, BMP and TIFF (single-page).

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.GetPageCount
member.summary: Returns document page count.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.GetPageRectangle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the page rectangle.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.GetPageRect_Left(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the specified page left coordinate.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.GetPageRect_Top(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the specified page top coordinate.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.GetPageRect_Width(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the specified page width.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.GetPageRect_Height(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the specified page height.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.SetExtractionArea(System.Drawing.RectangleF)
member.summary: Sets the extraction area by rectangle.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.SetExtractionArea(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the extraction area by coordinates and dimensions.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.ResetExtractionArea
member.summary: Resets the extraction area to full page.

member.name: E:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.PasswordRequired
member.summary: Occurs when the password required to decrypt the document.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.RegistrationName
member.summary: Registration name.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.RegistrationKey
member.summary: Registration key.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.Password
member.summary: PDF document owner password.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.Version
member.summary: Gets the component version number.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.BaseExtractor.CheckPermissions
member.summary: Defines whether respect permissions set by document owner. If True, extractor throws exception when the extraction is prohibited.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractionMode
member.summary: Defines HTML extraction modes.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractionMode.PlainHTML
member.summary: (0) Extract to HTML without formatting.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractionMode.HTMLWithCSS
member.summary: (1) Extract to HTML with CSS formatting.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.OutputImageFormat
member.summary: Defines format for output images.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.OutputImageFormat.PNG
member.summary: PNG format (0)

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.OutputImageFormat.BMP
member.summary: BMP format (1)

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.OutputImageFormat.TIFF
member.summary: TIFF format (2)

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.OutputImageFormat.JPEG
member.summary: JPEG format (3)

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.OutputImageFormat.GIF
member.summary: GIF format (4)

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.OutputImageFormat.EMF
member.summary: EMF format (5)

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.LineGroupingMode
member.summary: Sets if lines are not checked to be merged, can be merged by rows, or inside columns

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.LineGroupingMode.None
member.summary: No lines grouping. Each line is processed as a single row.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.LineGroupingMode.GroupByRows
member.summary: Each row is checked against next row to see if these rows can be grouped. Rows are grouped only if all cells in the current row are allowed to be grouped with all cells in next row.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.LineGroupingMode.GroupByColumns
member.summary: Each cell is checked against cell below in next row to see if the can be grouped. Cells are be grouped inside the same column even if cells in another columns can't be sgrouped.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.ColumnDetectionMode
member.summary: Represents the column detection modes.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.ColumnDetectionMode.ContentGroupsAndBorders
member.summary: Based on content groups and borders (vertical lines).

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.ColumnDetectionMode.ContentGroups
member.summary: Based on content groups only.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.ColumnDetectionMode.Borders
member.summary: Based on borders (vertical lines) only.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.PageDataCaching
member.summary: Page data caching behavior.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.PageDataCaching.None
member.summary: Previously accessed page data is not cached and disposed immediately after any other page accessed. Reduces memory usage.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.PageDataCaching.KeepAllPages
member.summary: Caches all parsed pages. You can manually dispose cached pages using method.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor
member.summary: Extracts text and images from PDF document and creates formated HTML page from extracted data.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor
member.summary: Defines the PDF to HTML extractor interface.

member.summary: Height of the output page rendered into HTML.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.GetPageHeight(System.Int32)
member.summary: Height of the PDF page (in pdf units)

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.GetPageWidth(System.Int32)
member.summary: Width of the PDF page (in pdf units)

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.GetHTML
member.summary: Extracts HTML from whole document.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.GetHTML(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts HTML text from specified page range.
member.param: End page index. -1 means all pages to the document end.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.GetHTMLPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts HTML from specified document page.

member.summary: Saves HTML text from specified page range to file.
member.param: End page index. -1 means all pages to the document end.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.SaveHtmlToFile(System.String)
member.summary: Saves HTML text to file.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.SaveHtmlPageToFile(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Saves HTML from specified page page to stream.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.SaveHtmlToStream(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves HTML text from specified page range to stream.
member.param: End page index. -1 means all pages to the document end.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.SaveHtmlToStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves HTML text to stream.

member.summary: Saves HTML from specified page page to stream.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.DisposePage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Disposes the page object. Uses this method carefully to destroy the page object that should not be used further. Useful to free allocated memory when processing huge PDF documents.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.ExtractionMode
member.summary: Extraction mode: plain HTML or formatted HTML with CSS.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.ExtractInvisibleText
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to extract invisible text from PDF document.
member.value: true if extract invisible text; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.OptimizeImages
member.summary: Gets or sets optimization of images (True by default)

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.OutputPageWidth
member.summary: Width of the output pages rendered into HTML.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.DetectLinesInsteadOfParagraphs
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to detect single lines or multiple lines of text
member.value: true if detects single lines of text; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.LineGroupingMode
member.summary: Sets how lines are grouped into paragraphs. Default: no lines grouping is performed.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.ColumnDetectionMode
member.summary: Column detection mode.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.DetectNewColumnBySpacesRatio
member.summary: Table columns detection option.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.HighPrecisionTextPositioning
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the high precision text positioning.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.PreserveFormattingOnTextExtraction
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to preserve the text formatting on the extraction.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.AddFontStyleHTMLTagsToText
member.summary: Controls if HTML output adds font style information to text objects True by default, set to False to output text objects as plain text objects without font size and style defined

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.FontSubstitutionMap
member.summary: Map to substitute fonts, you may add new mapping to match one source font to the target source font in output HTML

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.ControlsAsText
member.summary: Controls if renders the form text controls to a plain text objects. False by default, set to True to display controls as text.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.DetectHyperLinks
member.summary: Controls if URL links will be detected as set as clickable links or not True by default.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.IHTMLExtractor.OutputImageFormat
member.summary: Defines format for output images. Default is JPEG.

member.summary: Get height of the output page rendered in HTML format

member.summary: Get height of the original PDF page (in pdf units)

member.summary: Get height of the original PDF page (in pdf units)

member.summary: Table columns detection option: defines space between columns to detect text as a new column.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to extract invisible text from PDF document.
member.value: true if extract invisible text; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.PreserveFormattingOnTextExtraction
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to preserve the text formatting on the extraction.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.ColumnDetectionMode
member.summary: Column detection mode.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.LineGroupingMode
member.summary: Sets how lines are grouped into paragraphs. Default: no lines grouping is performed.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.DetectLinesInsteadOfParagraphs
member.summary: Tries to detect single lines instead of multiple lines.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.TrimSpaces
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to remove trailing and ending spaces from table cell values.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.OutputImageFormat
member.summary: Defines format for output images. Default is PNG (with transparency). If you do NOT need the transparency support and want to have smaller image sizes (so the page will load faster) then swith this proprety to OutputImageFormat.JPEG instead

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.ExtractionMode
member.summary: Extraction mode: plain HTML or formatted HTML with CSS.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.OptimizeImages
member.summary: Gets or sets optimization of images (True by default)

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.OutputPageWidth
member.summary: Set or get width (in pixels) of the output pages rendered into HTML. Default output width is 1024 (height is calculated and used according to the original pdf pages ratio)

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.HighPrecisionTextPositioning
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the high precision text positioning.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.AddFontStyleHTMLTagsToText
member.summary: Controls if HTML output adds font style information to text objects. True by default; set to False to output objects as plain text without font size and style defined

member.summary: Map to substitute fonts, you may add new mapping to match one source font to the target source font in output HTML.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.ControlsAsText
member.summary: Controls if renders the form text controls to a plain text objects. False by default, set to True to display controls as text.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.DetectHyperLinks
member.summary: Controls if URL links will be detected as set as clickable links or not True by default.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDF2HTML.HTMLExtractor.PageDataCaching
member.summary: Controls page data caching behavior.
